changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE DOMAIN ruleform.status AS character(1) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" DEFAULT 'U'::bpchar NOT NULL CONSTRAINT status_check CHECK ((VALUE = ANY (ARRAY['U'::bpchar, 'A'::bpchar, 'F'::bpchar, 'S'::bpchar]))); ALTER DOMAIN ruleform.status OWNER TO core;
